blocks.data:
Creates a *Product Review*.

**Required Fields**
- title
- date_reviewed

**Read-Only Fields**
* id

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

data.description: The model for a POST to create a product review.

title.description:
The title for the product review.
Required in /POST.

text.description: The text for the product review.

status.description: The status of the product review. Must be one of `approved`, `disapproved` or `pending`.

rating.description: The rating of the product review. Must be one of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

email.description: The email of the reviewer. Must be a valid email, or an empty string.

date_reviewed.description: Date the product was reviewed. Required in /POST.
